Text.Page:
Hey! You're ! You're practically a legend out here. You took down Thulsa, Killian, Akashaâ€”and Kelsaik!

Wow. Can I ask you a favor?"Sorry, I don't have a quill."

No, I don't want an autograph. I'm trying to whip these recruits into shape, and I bet a lesson from you would mean a lot to them.

Use that {@WorkObject:60} to bring a shadow reaver out to fight. Shouldn't be a problem. What do you say?

Damn. Even I learned a few things from that fight.

Thanks so much. And if you do find a quill, there are two l's in Ellak.
